item.description:
Come and help brainstorm how best to help
elect Ron Paul.

Meeting is from 6-8pm. Library closes
at 8 pm

At the library ask for location of 'Presidential
Election Discussion'

Tentative agenda is:

1. Intro (for those that have not met everyone)
(10 minutes)

2. Organization brainstorming (primarily what
Bob Dwyer learned at a meeting last week
with Anita Andrews, an official campaign organizer)
(50 minutes)

3. Event's brainstorming (30 minutes)

4. Campaign material discussion
(Unique ideas, how to "chipin" for material's)
(20 minutes)

5. Any other comments, questions, ideas not
relating to the above.
(10 minutes)

For more info and/or to propose agenda
changes contact Andrew
( siraud002@yahoo.com )
or Bob ( jukelsa3@yahoo.com )

Fields Corner library is a short walk from the Fields
Corner MBTA station on the Ashmont Red Line.
(Leaving the station -on Dorchester
Avenue turn left heading south on Dorchester
Avenue and walk one block. Library is on the left side )

There is a shopping mall parking lot across the street
from the library

Here's library info/directions
( http://www.bpl.org/br... )
and a map (http://www.bpl.org/br... ) .
item.name: Planning and Brainstorming for Ron Paul
